name: Crossroads (InkyBlots2)
description:
Crossroads is an action-adventure metroidvania game set across the circles of Hell. Awakening in Limbo, the player must traverse Gluttony and Heresy to unlock power-ups that expand their toolset, opening new routes for them to explore to eventually escape Hell's Crossroads.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Interact: Space

Sword Attack: Left Click

Water Dodge: Right Click (when unlocked)

Flame Shield: Shift (when unlocked)

Features

Fast Travel: Make use of the Crossroads to travel betwixt the circles of Hell.

Upgrades: 4 distinct weapon, health, and ability upgrades to be discovered by exploring the underworld domain.

Enemies: 6 unique enemy variants and bosses to defeat by making the most of the weapons and abilities at your disposal.

And more!

Credits

Crossroads was developed by a team of 8 as part of the 2021 Scapegoat Studios program, over the course of one month.
